Package au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.column

Record Class QuantityValue.ValueWithUnit

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.column.QuantityValue.ValueWithUnit
Record Components:
value - the value column
unit - the unit column
system - the system column
Enclosing class:
QuantityValue
public static record QuantityValue.ValueWithUnit(@Nonnull Column value, @Nonnull Column unit, @Nullable Column system) extends Record
A helper record to hold a value and a unit column.

Provides methods to extract different representations of a Quantity (normalized, original, literal) and to compare two QuantityValue.ValueWithUnit instances using a provided comparator, ensuring that the units are the same.

  • Method Details

    • normalizedValueOf

      @Nonnull public static QuantityValue.ValueWithUnit normalizedValueOf(@Nonnull Column quantity)
      Extracts the normalized (canonicalized) value and unit from a Quantity column.

      Uses canonicalized_value and canonicalized_code fields, with null system (as canonicalized quantities are system-independent).

      Parameters:
      quantity - the Quantity column
      Returns:
      a ValueWithUnit instance containing the normalized value and unit

    • originalValueOf

      @Nonnull public static QuantityValue.ValueWithUnit originalValueOf(@Nonnull Column quantity)
      Extracts the original value and unit from a Quantity column.

      Uses value, code (canonical unit code), and system fields. This representation is used for decimal-based comparisons.

      Parameters:
      quantity - the Quantity column
      Returns:
      a ValueWithUnit instance containing the original value and unit

    • literalValueOf

      @Nonnull public static QuantityValue.ValueWithUnit literalValueOf(@Nonnull Column quantity)
      Extracts the literal value and unit from a Quantity column.

      Uses value, unit (literal unit string as written, e.g., "days" instead of "day"), and system fields. This representation is used for exact string matching in unit conversion.

      Parameters:
      quantity - the Quantity column
      Returns:
      a ValueWithUnit instance containing the literal value and unit

    • compare

      @Nonnull public Column compare(@Nonnull QuantityValue.ValueWithUnit other, @Nonnull BinaryOperator<Column> comparator)
      Compares this ValueWithUnit with another using the provided value comparator.

      First checks that units match (and systems match if present), then applies the comparator to the values. Returns null if units/systems don't match.

      Parameters:
      other - the ValueWithUnit to compare with
      comparator - the binary operator to apply to values (e.g., Column::equalTo)
      Returns:
      Column expression with comparison result, or null if units don't match
